message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
